item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "A wise girl kisses but doesn't love, listens but doesn't believe, and leaves before she is left." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "If you can make a woman laugh, you can make her do anything." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "It's better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I am good, but not an angel. I do sin, but I am not the devil. I am just a small girl in a big world trying to find someone to love." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Bette Midler
item.description: "Give a girl the right shoes, and she can conquer the world." -- Bette Midler

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I don't mind living in a man's world, as long as I can be a woman in it." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Who said nights were for sleep?" -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "It's not true that I had nothing on. I had the radio on." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "The nicest thing for me is sleep, then at least I can dream." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I don't mind being burdened with being glamorous and sexual. Beauty and femininity are ageless and can't be contrived, and glamour, although the manufacturers won't like this, cannot be manufactured. Not real glamour; it's based on femininity." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "We are all of us stars, and we deserve to twinkle." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "All little girls should be told they are pretty, even if they aren't." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I restore myself when I'm alone." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Sex is part of nature. I go along with nature." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I believe that everything happens for a reason. People change so that you can learn to let go, things go wrong so that you appreciate them when they're right, you believe lies so you eventually learn to trust no one but yourself, and sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "We should all start to live before we get too old. Fear is stupid. So are regrets." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "The body is meant to be seen, not all covered up." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I've been on a calendar, but never on time." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "The real lover is the man who can thrill you by kissing your forehead or smiling into your eyes or just staring into space." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I have too many fantasies to be a housewife.... I guess I am a fantasy." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Ever notice how 'What the hell' is always the right answer?" -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I don't want to make money, I just want to be wonderful." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by James Dean
item.description: "Only the gentle are ever really strong." -- James Dean

item.title: Maria add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Maria add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Maria add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Maria add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I can resist anything except temptation." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "She was a girl who knew how to be happy even when she was sad. And that’s important—you know " -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Maria add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "It's all make believe, isn't it?" -- Marilyn Monroe
